message:
Your post on /r/{{.Config.Subreddit}}, [{{.Post.Data.Title}}](http://www.reddit.com/r/{{.Config.Subreddit}}/comments/{{.Post.Data.Id}}), has received many responses. If you feel that your question has been adequately explained, click [here](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose/?to={{.Config.Username}}&subject=flair&message={{.Post.Data.Name}}) and hit "send" to mark it as explained or do it manually.

 **I am a bot. Please do not respond to me other than through the [mark answered](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose/?to={{.Config.Username}}&subject=flair&message={{.Post.Data.Name}}) link above.** 

 If you wish to communicate with the ELI5 moderators, [click here](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose/?to=/r/{{.Config.Subreddit}}).
messagesubject: Has your ELI5 post been answered?
